channel.title: Weapon gfx plz help i really need this!~~~~~~~
channel.description:
ok i deleted the code for the gfx when atting npcs so i need that
one more question in some servers you type ::range then tele to range guild and click the target to get range exp but i cahnged 1 thing and now it loggs you off when you click it but i want a range target in the dummy place and a bookcase for mage in the same place also plz help

item.title: Weapon gfx plz help i really need this!~~~~~~~
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

[quote=“Goodoo dolls, post:5, topic:165986”] case 2513: if(actionTimer == 10) {//you can change the 0 sendMessage("You train Range!");//you can change the message addSkillXP((52*playerLevel[4]), 300);//change the stat if you like actionTimer = 10; setAnimation(0x1810); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;

what is wrong with it??? i cant get range exp i turn to it and i wont attack it??!?!? plz help[/quote]
theres a 300, after the 52*playerLevel[4]), 300) you dont nee that 300 it shouldnt bee there

Read full topic
item.source: Weapon gfx plz help i really need this!~~~~~~~

item.title: Weapon gfx plz help i really need this!~~~~~~~
item.dc:creator: @Goodoo_dolls Goodoo dolls
item.description:
@Goodoo_dolls wrote:

case 2513:
if(actionTimer == 10) {//you can change the 0
sendMessage("You train Range!");//you can change the message
addSkillXP((52*playerLevel[4]), 300);//change the stat if you like
actionTimer = 10;
setAnimation(0x1810);
updateRequired = true; 
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

what is wrong with it??? i cant get range exp i turn to it and i wont attack it??!?!? plz help

Read full topic
item.source: Weapon gfx plz help i really need this!~~~~~~~

item.title: Weapon gfx plz help i really need this!~~~~~~~
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

you do it with a case

case 2873://change the case number into whatever you object i is if(actionTimer == 0) {//you can change the 0 sendMessage("You train Attack!");//you can change the message actionTimer = 20; setAnimation(2068); addSkillXP((65*playerLevel[0]), 0);//change the stat if you like updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;

Read full topic
